short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides an UI interface to the ChatGPT API

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
br-AI-n is the ultimate Chrome extension for conversational AI! With br-AI-n, you can easily create and manage multiple profiles for ChatGPT, the popular AI chatbot. Create your own custom profiles for ChatGPT to give it different personalities, allowing it to understand and respond to different conversations. With br-AI-n, you no longer have to switch between different tabs to use ChatGPT. Just open the extension and start chatting with ChatGPT, without any hassle. Try br-AI-n today!

NOTE: You need to have an OpenAI account in order to use this extension!
